name: Pipeline Defender Ludum Dare 52
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/pipeline-defender

You’re defending the water supply pipeline as it “Harvests” deep in the ground water! Waves of monsters will attack the pipes, attempting to break through and contaminate the water supply. You must use a variety of weapons and strategies to fend off the monsters and protect the pipes.

Controls

For Single Player

Keyboard

  • Movement = Arrow Keys
  • Shoot = Space

Controller

  • Movement = D-Pad
  • Shoot = (Xbox) A and (PS) X

For Multiplayer

4x Controller 

  • Movement = D-Pad
  • Shoot = (Xbox) A and (PS) X
